extDesc.message: terkait analyzes semantic objects on a webpage and presents related content.

browserActDescDisabled.message: Sorry, this extension is not available for this type of webpage! Please try news pages.

loaderMsg.message: There's some hardcore semantic analysis going on...

correctRelevantButtonMsg.message: Toggle this if it is correct and relevant.

correctNotRelevantButtonMsg.message: Toggle this if it is correct but not relevant.

incorrectButtonMsg.message: Toggle this if it is incorrect.
